questions.question_text: Tyār bād dāsbhāve purushoe sāşhţāng dandavat praņām karavā ane strīoe besīne ______ praņām karavā.
questions.explanation: The complete shlok is: Tyār bād dāsbhāve purushoe sāşhţāng dandavat praņām karavā ane strīoe besīne panchāng praņām karavā. (69)

questions.question_text: Sāşhţāngā dandavat kāryāh praņāmāh purushais-tataha | Nārībhis-tūpavishyaiva panchāngā dāsa-bhāvataha ||
questions.explanation: This is the Sanskrit shlok for number 69 from Satsang Diksha.

questions.question_text: Koī bhaktano droh thayo hoy tenā nivāranne arthe ______ pratidin ek dandavat praņām adhik karavo.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: Koī bhaktano droh thayo hoy tenā nivāranne arthe kshamā-yāchanā-pūrvak pratidin ek dandavat praņām adhik karavo.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād sarvanā kendra samān ane vyāpak evā Akshar-Purushottam Mahārājne sambhāratā pratimāonī pradakshiņā karavī.
questions.explanation: This is the Gujarati translation of Shlok 68.

questions.question_text: Tatah sanchintayan kuryād ______ | Vyāpakam sarva kendram cha pratimānām pradakshiņāhā ||
questions.explanation: The complete shlok is: Tatah sanchintayan kuryād Akshara-Purushottamam | Vyāpakam sarva kendram cha pratimānām pradakshiņāhā || 68 ||

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā jīvnu bhūndu thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī pāpe karīne nathī thatu; ane Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je sevā banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā jīvnu rūdu thây chhe ne e jīvne sukh thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu...
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada I-40.

questions.question_text: Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne ______ na karavo.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na karavo.

questions.question_text: Praņāmo dandavach-chaikah kshamā-yāchana-pūrvakam | Bhakta-droha-nivārārtham kāryo'dhiko hi pratyaham ||
questions.explanation: This is the Sanskrit shlok for number 70 from Satsang Diksha.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād sarvanā ______ samān ane vyāpak evā Akshar-Purushottam Mahārājne sambhāratā pratimāonī pradakshiņā karavī.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: Tyār bād sarvanā kendra samān ane vyāpak evā Akshar-Purushottam Mahārājne sambhāratā pratimāonī pradakshiņā karavī.

questions.question_text: Tyār bād dāsbhāve purushoe sāşhţāng dandavat praņām karavā ane strīoe besīne panchāng praņām karavā.
questions.explanation: This is the Gujarati translation of Shlok 69.
